Summary Note:
Østergaard Petersen Gundersen and the RM are cousins, having grown up together in Copenhagen. Their familial bond has naturally extended into a professional partnership built on mutual respect and shared values.
With a career spanning nearly 44 years, Østergaard Petersen Gundersen has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons he decided to join.
Family Background: Østergaard Petersen Gundersen has been happily married to Agnes since 1991. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
Østergaard graduated from Herning Gymnasium in 1976.
Østergaard attended University of Southern Denmark - Faculty of Engineering and graduated in 1981.
He also pursued further higher education at Technical University of Denmark (DTU), graduating in 1986.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 44 years, Østergaard Petersen Gundersen has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Østergaard Petersen Gundersen's first role was as a Research Scientist at  Zealand Pharma A/S, where he worked diligently from 1981 to 1986 to establish a strong reputation.
His subsequent role was as a Biotech Startup Founder at  Zealand Pharma A/S, where he continued to grow professionally from 1988 till retirement.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 4200000 DKK, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He owns flat in Odense, where he resides. It is worth 830000 DKK.

He purchased condo in Sønderborg, where he spends his holidays. It is valued at 925000 DKK.
On top of that he inherited a beautiful condo in Skanderborg, which could be used as a weekend getaway. It is valued at 1260000 DKK.
He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
